sentence.Network_en: Some countries suggested that the price of oil be pegged down.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些国家建议应该限定石油价格.

sentence.Network_en: A plastic sheet was pegged down over the compost heap to hasten decomposition.
sentence.Network_cn: 把塑料布覆盖在肥堆上,并用木桩固定好,以加速肥料的分解.

list.abs: Have difficulty pegging the tent down in a storm ., 在暴风雨中固定帐篷有困难.
She pegged down the stairs ., 她急忙下楼.
peewit 田凫peg down 用木钉钉住peg 钉
这连衣裙我是买现成的。peg down 用木桩钉住，约束，谈妥The government is attempting to peg down the price.
down peg is one thing ., 瓦解哈马斯是一回事.

sentences.sentence: "the pegged-down branches of the plant will take root"
